name: Stock Report
query:
select `tabIMS Stock Entry`.`name` as `Name`,
`tabIMS Stock Entry`.`stock_entry_type` as `Stock Entry Type`,
`tabIMS Stock Entry`.`posting_date` as `Posting Date`,
`tabIMS Stock Entry`.`posting_time` as `Posting Time`,
`tabIMS Stock Entry Detail`.`source_warehouse` as `Source Warehouse`,
`tabIMS Stock Entry Detail`.`target_warehouse` as `Target Warehouse`,
`tabIMS Stock Entry Detail`.`item_code` as `Item Code`,
`tabIMS Stock Entry Detail`.`item_name` as `Item Name`,
`tabIMS Stock Entry Detail`.`item_group` as `Item Group`,
`tabIMS Stock Entry Detail`.`uom` as `UOM`,
`tabIMS Stock Entry Detail`.`qty` as `Quantity`,
`tabIMS Stock Entry Detail`.`rate` as `Rate`,
`tabIMS Stock Entry Detail`.`total_Amount` as `Total Amount`
from `tabIMS Stock Entry`
join `tabIMS Stock Entry Detail` 
on `tabIMS Stock Entry`.`name` = `tabIMS Stock Entry Detail`.`parent` and 
`tabIMS Stock Entry`.`docstatus`=1 and 
`tabIMS Stock Entry`.`stock_entry_type`=%(stock_entry)s and
`tabIMS Stock Entry`.`posting_date` between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s;
